Replace.Text: Hundred Ghosts Night Journey Joint Academy
Hundred Ghosts Night Journey Joint Academy
[ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspiration provides all the boost needed for social systems. [ICON_Culture] Culture is reduced by -50% per turn.
You gain 2 additional Masterpiece Writing slots in the Amphitheater. The theme will be applied when all of the masterpiece slots in the amphitheater are filled.
Rock bands perform at a level 4 higher in the theater district and entertainment complex special district tiles.

This is a unit that can cause natural disasters and plunder special districts. After moving the Flower, Bird, Wind, and Moon to the appropriate location, you can use the Natural Disaster action to cause a flood, fire, or volcanic eruption in nearby tiles. It can be purchased with faith, and loot cannot be obtained by plundering special districts.
This unit can enter foreign territory even without an open border agreement.
[COLOR:Civ6Red]Must be used on floodplains, forests, rainforests, next to volcanoes, or in special districts.[ENDCOLOR]

It is a special district unique to Hundred Ghosts Night that does not require population. Replaces the Entertainment Complex district, provides [ICON_Amenities] +3 amenities, and has lower construction costs. You always receive [ICON_Culture] Culture +4 as an adjacency bonus, and a [ICON_Culture] Culture +3 adjacency bonus is granted to the theater district. You can run the unique project Hundred Ghost Nights Lantern Festival, which provides culture, gold, and faith.

It is a special district unique to Hundred Ghosts Night that does not require population. Replaces the Entertainment Complex district, provides [ICON_Amenities] +3 amenities, and has lower construction costs. You always receive [ICON_Culture] Culture +4 as an adjacency bonus, and a [ICON_Culture] Culture +3 adjacency bonus is granted to the theater district. You can run a unique project, Hundred Ghost Nights Lantern Festival, which provides [ICON_Culture] Culture, [ICON_Gold] Gold, and [ICON_Faith] Faith.
[ICON_Culture] Culture +{1_num} in the adjacent Matsuri Operations Management Department.

It is a city project that provides [ICON_Culture] culture, [ICON_Gold] gold, and [ICON_Faith] faith each turn, and increases the loyalty influence this city exerts on the city itself and other cities adjacent to it. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]When activated, each [ICON_Citizen] citizen here exerts +0.5 Loyalty Influence in this city. This also affects other cities within 9 tiles, but the effect per tile is 10% lower. Upon completion, you will immediately receive a small amount of [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer points and +20 Loyalty in this city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires: Matsuri Operations Department.
Hundred Ghost Night Journey Yin Yang Department Main Building
Hundred Ghosts Night Whirlpool Movie Village
